channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelette in 'Pups Save a Hatchling', then in 'Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand', Traveling Travis volunteers to watch the farm. (S9, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Tractor: Mummy and Daddy Pig get stuck behind Mrs Badger's tractor on the way to her farm, where Peppa and George learn about how useful tractors can be, even if they aren't very fast.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Undersea Party: Peppa, George, Molly Mole and Freddy Fox play in the garden. Molly digs a tunnel and hits a box of pirate treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Club House; Detective Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Shop; Clubhouse Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Talking; Woodland Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub', and in 'Pups Save a Drive-In', the pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector. (S10, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger's reflector causes a bridge to burn in 'Pups vs. The Hum-Flector', then in 'Pups Save a Capybara', the Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara. (S10, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Planes, Trains, and Kitty Balloons!: Gabby unboxes a passport-like travel book and three tickets that take her on a dollhouse travel adventure. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Danny's Pirate Bedroom; Weather Station: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roller Disco; Guinea Pigs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Bruno's Blustery Day: On a windy day, the team has to band together for an important delivery. When it seems the elements will be too much, they learn they can ask each other for help. (S27, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Rock Garden: The children learn about the weather. There is a new friend for Peppa, and Grandpa Pig is making a rock garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Charity Shop: Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, Peppa and George decide to take all the things they don't use anymore to the charity shop, which raises money to help others.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: The Smurfs put their parenting skills to the test in 'Bringing Up Smurfy', then in 'The Makeover', Vanity wants to design an outfit for the Smurfs, but he and Tailor have different visions. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwells send Sam and Kit a strange case in 'The Frozen Stowaways', then in 'The Puzzle of the Empty Pond', a salamander mom wonders why her dry pond hasn't filled up with water. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger is ready for a special day in 'Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch', then in 'Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone', the Museum has a brand-new exhibit - which goes missing. (S11, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox in 'Pups Save a Jukebox', then in 'Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire', a hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go wrong. (S9, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove when 'The Crew Builds A Giant Dam', then in 'The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm', Farmer Zoe has a squirrel problem. (S1, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Tiger Treasure: Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure. (S6, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Spaceship: The Dollhouse Delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden! (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Betty Caterpillar: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Bill and Jill's satellite van has a hole in it in 'The Case of the Big Chomp', and in 'The Secret of the Salt Cave', Sam and Kit investigate the shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Marshall Kitty gets trapped in a life-sized pinata in 'Pups Save a Hum-nata', then in 'Pups Stop the Foggy Skies', Humdinger pushes fog into Adventure Bay. (S10, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Families: While drawing pictures at playgroup, Peppa and her friends learn about each other's families, from Suzy sheep who lives with Mummy Sheep to Freddy Fox who lives with Mr. Fox.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Owl: Peppa and George visit Granny and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa is building a special hiding hut to watch birds in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; The Big Hill: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington wants to make a special cake when 'Paddington Celebrates Mrs Bird's Day', then in 'Paddington The Table Tennis Champ', Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team! (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park in 'Paddington Gets Fit', then in 'Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair', Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair accidentally gets broken. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.
